title: California Love
description: A novelization of four exciting episodes of the hit TV series!Critical MessBruce Patman's uncle is making a movie in Sweet Valley, and Jessica wants a part. But when Elizabeth gives her acting a bad review in The Oracle, it's war between the twins!Oracle On AirSweet Valley High is getting its own TV station! Now it's Jessica against Elizabeth in a fight for the spotlight...Skin & BonesJessica's desperate to be picked as the model for Dakota Dancer's new painting. Will she really bare all for art?Dangerous LoveJessica's after a college guy - but is she willing to do what it takes to keep him?
author: Francine Pascal
